hibernate-mapping.query: FROM OutboundDatasyncConfigOfficeDO configOffice where configOffice.recordStatus='A' order by configOffice.outboundOfficeCategory desc
FROM OutboundDatasyncConfigOfficeDO configOffice where configOffice.outboundOfficeCategory=:outboundOfficeCategory AND configOffice.recordStatus='A' order by configOffice.officeLavel

select distinct(office.officeId) from com.ff.domain.organization.OfficeDO as office,com.ff.domain.bcun.OutboundDatasyncConfigOfficeDO as liveOffice
inner join liveOffice.outboundOffice as outboundOff where (office.reportingRHO IN(outboundOff.officeId) or office.officeId IN (outboundOff.officeId) OR office.reportingHUB IN (outboundOff.officeId) OR office.cityId IN (outboundOff.cityId) )
SELECT office.outboundOffice.officeId FROM com.ff.domain.bcun.OutboundDatasyncConfigOfficeDO office WHERE office.isActiveForOpsman = 'Y'
select distinct(configOffice.outboundOffice.officeId) FROM com.ff.domain.bcun.OutboundDatasyncConfigOfficeDO configOffice where configOffice.recordStatus='A' order by configOffice.officeLavel
